Mission.title: About Royal Gate Real Estate
Mission.subtitle: Your trusted partner in Dubai's dynamic real estate market
Mission.aboutContent:
Royal Gate Real Estate L.L.C is a leading real estate brokerage firm based in Dubai, specializing in property sales and leasing services. With our office strategically located in Al Baraha, we serve clients across Dubai's most prestigious neighborhoods.

Established with a vision to provide exceptional real estate services, we have built a reputation for professionalism, integrity, and results-driven approach. Our team of experienced real estate professionals understands the nuances of Dubai's property market and is committed to helping clients achieve their real estate goals.
Mission.missionContent:
Our mission is to provide unparalleled real estate services that exceed client expectations. We strive to be the most trusted real estate partner in Dubai by delivering personalized solutions, market expertise, and exceptional customer service.

We are committed to helping our clients make informed decisions whether they are buying their dream home, investing in commercial properties, or seeking the perfect rental property. Our comprehensive approach ensures that every transaction is smooth, transparent, and successful.
Mission.valuesContent:
Integrity: We conduct all our business with the highest ethical standards

Expertise: Our team brings deep knowledge of Dubai's real estate market

Client-First Approach: Your satisfaction and success are our top priorities

Transparency: We believe in clear, honest communication throughout every transaction

Excellence: We are committed to delivering exceptional results in every interaction

PropertyProcess.subtitle: Simple & Transparent
PropertyProcess.title: How We Work With You
PropertyProcess.description: Our streamlined process ensures a smooth and successful property transaction from start to finish

step1.title: Property Search & Selection
step1.description: We listen to your requirements and preferences to identify properties that match your needs. Our extensive network gives you access to exclusive listings across Dubai's best neighborhoods.

step2.title: Property Viewing & Evaluation
step2.description: We arrange convenient property viewings and provide detailed market analysis, helping you understand the true value and potential of each property.

step3.title: Negotiation & Documentation
step3.description: Our experienced team handles all negotiations on your behalf and manages the complete documentation process, ensuring all legal requirements are met.

step4.title: Closing & Handover
step4.description: We coordinate the final steps of your transaction, from payment processing to key handover, ensuring a seamless transition to your new property.

opportunity4.title: Golden Visa Eligibility
opportunity4.description: Property investments above AED 2 million qualify for UAE's long-term residency visa program

FAQ.subtitle: Common Questions
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to common questions about buying, selling, and renting properties in Dubai
FAQ.imageDescription: Our expert team is here to answer all your questions about Dubai's real estate market

faq1.question: Can foreigners buy property in Dubai?
faq1.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in designated freehold areas across Dubai. These include popular locations such as Downtown Dubai, Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, and many other prime areas. Property ownership in these zones comes with full ownership rights.

faq2.question: What are the costs involved in buying property?
faq2.answer: When buying property in Dubai, you should budget for: Dubai Land Department (DLD) transfer fee (4% of property value), real estate agent commission (typically 2% + VAT), mortgage registration fee (if applicable), and property valuation fee. Our team provides a detailed breakdown of all costs involved.

faq3.question: How long does the property buying process take?
faq3.answer: The typical property purchase process in Dubai takes 2-4 weeks from offer acceptance to completion. This includes property viewing, offer negotiation, NOC (No Objection Certificate) from developer, mortgage approval (if applicable), and final transfer at Dubai Land Department.

faq4.question: What is the average rental yield in Dubai?
faq4.answer: Dubai offers attractive rental yields, typically ranging from 5-8% annually depending on the location and property type. Prime locations like Downtown Dubai and Dubai Marina often provide yields between 5-6%, while emerging areas can offer even higher returns.

faq5.question: Do I need to pay property tax in Dubai?
faq5.answer: No, there is no property tax, capital gains tax, or income tax on rental income in Dubai. Property owners only pay an annual service charge for maintenance of common areas, and a 5% municipality tax on rental income (paid by tenants through DEWA bills).

faq6.question: What documents do I need to buy property in Dubai?
faq6.answer: Required documents include: Valid passport copy, valid UAE visa/residence permit (or entry stamp for non-residents), Emirates ID (for residents), proof of income or bank statements (for mortgage), and NOC from developer (for resale properties). We guide you through the complete documentation process.

FAQ.contactPrompt: Still have questions? Our team is ready to help you.
